headline: Susquehanna Remains Bullish on Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Amid Strong Earnings and Production Momentum
summary: With significant hedge fund interest, Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) secures a spot on our list of the 12 best commodity stocks to buy right now. On November 13, 2025, Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) saw Susquehanna reiterate its “Buy” rating and raise its price target to $55 from $54. The firm noted that the company exceeded […]

headline: Analysis-U.S. companies hold the line at climate talks despite Trump
summary: By Simon Jessop BELEM, Brazil (Reuters) -Despite the U.S. government souring on the global climate agenda ahead of the COP30 summit, American companies did not shy away.
